name: Mucus Goals
description:
You are Mucus, a bugger that as every bugger, can control people. Your mission will be to infiltrate on a military base and get to the female Mucus before the scientists can absorb her powers. 

A platform game mixed with 2D puzzles in which the principal game flow is controlling diverse NPCs to surpass the different obstacles in your way. Your success depends on your will to take decisions and choose your actions strategically to overcame the challenge of the game.
